feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve tasks page for mass operations. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/pull/306
  • Make it possible to view local item info by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/pull/308
  • minor design update for index page. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/pull/309
  • 47484c2 make datastore.get key optional. by arabcoders
  • c4b8bf5 Fix sio disconnect event by arabcoders
  • e02fedf Improve tasks page for mass operations. by arabcoders
  • e77ed11 fix by arabcoders
  • 8fe68f3 Merge pull request #306 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 875d488 add api/item/{id} endpoint by arabcoders
  • 7dca15a clean up item object by arabcoders
  • c8dbd93 make it possible to view local item info by arabcoders
  • 3f3f63f Merge pull request #308 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 291c465 improve task logging by arabcoders
  • a188c20 packages update by arabcoders
  • a2f5c77 minor design update for index page. by arabcoders
  • de4b88e Merge pull request #309 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/ytptube/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.4
entry.content:
• d0630f7 Change re-queue text to retry by arabcoders
  • a81ee12 Improved playlist handling by arabcoders
  • bd695e7 Remove the redundant usage of AsyncPool and replace it with asyncio semaphore by arabcoders
  • b37d614 Migrate configStore to ts by arabcoders
  • f6e3c94 minor changes to the event bus dispatcher by arabcoders
  • 7469968 minor logs update by arabcoders
  • 8c82d1b create new loop in main thread by arabcoders
  • 3e00ebd fix big in tailing log by arabcoders
  • fdec235 Fix tasks not dispatching by arabcoders
  • c367b7a strip leading/ending whitespace from task data. by arabcoders
  • 8dc1707 print progress hook data if we are running in debug mode. by arabcoders
  • 43aef86 switch from config.version to config.app_version by arabcoders
  • a9cb816 Fix login cookie not being set correctly. Closes #310 by arabcoders
  • 7e29e7b Handle tasks exception by arabcoders
  • de30400 make it more clear when item has already been downloaded. by arabcoders
  • 388ed0b Handle Download queue task exceptions by arabcoders
  • a584ffc prevent the Download queue from back pressuring the event loop by arabcoders
  • 44b395a use proper names for all create_tasks by arabcoders
  • 6ba37fa refactor: reorganize imports and add whitespace by arabcoders
  • 9dd7130 implements real throttle for playlist processor. by arabcoders
  • ccb5b37 Fix playlist_autonumber by arabcoders
  • da8ecd2 Added missing playlist_ keys by arabcoders
  • 1ce9acd Merge pull request #311 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.5
entry.content:
• 3d11c63 Update yt-dlp to 2025.6.25 by ArabCoders
  • 77de10a Merge pull request #312 from arabcoders/create-pull-request/patch by Abdulmohsen
  • 312e3fd hardcode multidict to 6.5.1 to prevent a bug in aiohttp. by arabcoders
  • 25b7aad Fix running in subpath again. by arabcoders
  • b5bb2a2 Merge pull request #313 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.1.6
entry.content:
• ebb7299 Implements ytdlp filter logic to our own playlist processing. by arabcoders
  • 3fe9188 Merge pull request #314 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 4f7da0b support preset in yt-dlp/url/info endpoint. by arabcoders
  • ffefc3d renamed presets and added optimized preset for mobile devices. by arabcoders
  • 8e3e7dd Merge pull request #316 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • d0ae46b sometimes yt-dlp info extract doesn't return formats. by arabcoders
  • 6c44c58 Merge pull request #317 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.2.0
entry.content:
• 8db8e86 updated yt-dlp to 2025.06.30 by arabcoders
  • 1d6f810 updated frontend packages by arabcoders
  • 31aa15e Added file browser actions by arabcoders
  • b70cd47 error message update by arabcoders
  • 26455b6 Merge pull request #319 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
